description: This PHP source file provides utility functions for validating input data such as printable characters, IP addresses, URLs, MAC addresses, ports, IDs, times, days, SSID names, and strings with special character constraints. It also initializes a CSRF protection library and manages localization settings for a web UI.

methods.name: printableCharacters
methods.description: Checks if the input string consists of printable ASCII characters within a specified range or all printable characters if no range is specified.

methods.name: noSpace
methods.description: Validates that the input contains at least one non-whitespace character.

methods.name: validIPAddr
methods.description: Verifies whether the input is a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.

methods.name: validLink
methods.description: Checks if the input string is a valid URL label per the URL specifications.

methods.name: validMAC
methods.description: Validates if the input string is a properly formatted MAC address with further checks.

methods.name: validPort
methods.description: Checks if the port number falls within the valid range 1-65535.

methods.name: validId
methods.description: Verifies if the ID is within the range 1-256.

methods.name: validId_PC
methods.description: Validates parentally controlled IDs, allowing for ranges like '10_12'.

methods.name: isValInArray
methods.description: Checks if a value exists in an array.

methods.name: isValInRange
methods.description: Verifies if a numeric value falls within a specified range.

methods.name: validURL
methods.description: Validates that the input string is a properly formatted URL, supporting both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

methods.name: validTime
methods.description: Checks that the start time is earlier than the end time within the 24-hour format range.

methods.name: validDays
methods.description: Confirms that specified days are within the accepted set of days.

methods.name: valid_ssid_name
methods.description: Ensures the SSID name complies with length, character restrictions, and reserved keyword constraints.

methods.name: is_allowed_string
methods.description: Checks if the input string does not contain forbidden characters like <, >, &, ', ", |.

methods.name: remove_special_char
methods.description: Removes or checks for certain special characters in a string.
